title: Champion Mastery Score Problem
body:
I noticed recently that I wasnt receiving champion mastery score eg S, A, B etc after games when I got an S on a champion who hadnt unlocked the free chest. After closer inspection I have seen that the champion still has N/A as its score. I then checked other champions and some that I have played this season have N/A aswell. 

I am not sure how long this issue has been going on for however it was happening prior to patch 7.9 and currently still not working. 

I have repaired client, restarted client and computer logged in and out of other accounts. I have also submitted two bug report but have heard nothing back. 

So decided to post on the community board instead. 

Please help.
